abstract: Chinese government releases results of investigation into June cruise ship disaster that left only dozen survivors and killed hundreds on board; disaster on Yangtze River is attributed to violent weather, but captain of ship as well as government officials are blamed for contributing to disaster's scope through poor decisions and laxity.
lead_paragraph: But a Chinese government inquiry also found fault with the captain and dozens of officials, because of poor decisions and laxity.

headline.main: Investigators Blame Violent Weather for Yangtze Cruise Ship Disaster
headline.print_headline: Weather Is Blamed for Ship Disaster in China

snippet: But a Chinese government inquiry also found fault with the captain and dozens of officials, because of poor decisions and laxity.
